FuncDef: The undo rule command deletes an ACL rule in the basic ACL view. The undo rule command deletes an ACL rule in the basic ACL view. By default, no basic  ACL rule is created and no description is configured for an ACL rule.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an ACL rule.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-acl4-basic-2999] rule 23 description This rule is used to filter packets according to the source IP address.
ExtraInfo: Run the rule description command to configure a description for an ACL in any of the following situations:
